awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Invariants for Abelian Groups and    Representations of Posets
awd_abstract_narration: The primary goal of this research is the study of the                      invariants for a class of torsion-free Abelian groups of finite                 rank known as the Butler groups. The invariants are to be examined              concurrently in the context of representations of finite partially              ordered sets.  A study of Coxeter correspondences and almost split              sequences is included in the project with the aim of expanding the              menu of potentially classifiable groups and representations.                         The research is in the general area of algebra and is                      concerned with the structure theory of infinite groups having a                 commutative multiplicative structure - the Abelian groups.  These               groups arise in a variety of settings in algebra, geometry, and                 analysis.  This research concerns the classification of invariants              for selected families of these Abelian groups in anticipation of                obtaining a general structure theory.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
